service-tokens-description: Every service token is specific to you, a certain project and a certain environment within this project.

add-dialog.title: Add a service token for {{target}}
add-dialog.description: When a token is generated, you will only be able to see it once before it disappears. Make sure to save it somewhere.
add-dialog.name: Service Token Name
add-dialog.copy-service-token-description: Once you close this popup, you will never see your service token again
